definition: ventilator (artificial breathing apparatus used in hospitals)
to call/to cry/to shout/to breath out/to exhale
to breathe/to suck in/to absorb/to inhale

pinyin: er4 ji2 tou2 hu1 xi1 qi4
bei4 yong4 er4 ji2 tou2 hu1 xi1 qi4

sentences.english: S38:In case of insufficient ventilation, wear suitable respiratory equipment.
sentences.chinese: 通風不良時，須佩戴適當的呼吸器。

sentences.english: The scuba diver submerged and swarm toward a coral reef.
sentences.chinese: 戴着呼吸器的潛水員潛入水底，朝珊瑚礁遊了過去。

sentences.english: If you breathe too much ozone it can cause all kinds of respiratory problems.
sentences.chinese: 吸入過多的臭氧，會引起呼吸器官的多種疾病。

sentences.english: In emergency situations, self-contained breathing apparatus (SCBA) may be required.
sentences.chinese: 在緊急情況下，可能要求有自給式呼吸器。

sentences.english: We manufacture a full line of Liquid Oxygen Reservoirs and Liquid Oxygen Portables.
sentences.chinese: 我們製造規格全的液氧罐和便攜式呼吸器。

sentences.english: Cross, on a respirator , responded the only way he could -- with tears.
sentences.chinese: 克羅斯戴着一個呼吸器，只能用熱淚作爲迴應。

sentences.english: A self-contained breathing apparatus air cylinder will last between 30 to 45 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 一個自我呼吸器氣缸將持續30至45分鐘之間。

sentences.english: Facemasks and respirators are not recommended in lower exposure risk work environments.
sentences.chinese: 在低暴露風險工作環境不推薦使用口罩和呼吸器。

sentences.english: It requires not only the body's respiratory machinery but also oxygen.
sentences.chinese: 它不僅需要身體的呼吸器官，還需要氧氣。

sentences.english: I nearly suffocated when the pipe of my breathing apparatus came adrift.
sentences.chinese: 呼吸器上的管子脫落時，我差點給憋死。

sentences.english: The liver is the detoxification organs are the respiratory gills.
sentences.chinese: 肝臟是解毒器官，鰓是呼吸器官。

sentences.english: The Relationship between Nutritional Status, Respiratory Muscle Strength and Ventilator …
sentences.chinese: 重症病患的營養狀態及呼吸肌力與呼吸器脫離。

sentences.english: He would never even breathe again without the aid of a respirator.
sentences.chinese: 他也許永遠就只能靠着呼吸器來呼吸了。

sentences.english: Fits most SCBAs with only minor adjustments.
sentences.chinese: 只需稍微調試，即可用於大多數呼吸器。

sentences.english: Keep your regulator in your mouth until you are on the boat orthe beach.
sentences.chinese: 保持呼吸器在你口中，除非你上船或上岸。

pinyin: fu2 li4 tiao2 zheng3 zhuang1 zhi4

definition: tracheotomy (abbr. for 氣管切開術|气管切开术[qi4 guan3 qie1 kai1 shu4])
